concept.title: Cúram cryptography
concept.shortdesc: Cúram cryptography relates to functions for managing passwords.

conbody.p: Cúram cryptography is covered in detail in Configuring Security. Consult this reference with the following in mind:

ul.li: For production environments, you must modify the default settings.
For development and test environments, consider whether the defaults provide acceptable protection in your environment.
